Welcome to pocket-TO's documentation!
=====================================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   This application is used to assist in
   automating competitive events by running
   algorithims for you and keep track of a simple data base



Indices and tables
==================

* :ref:`getting started`
   You simply need to make sure you have all the libraries installed
   and run it via a server through Django
